<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quickened Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=199) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 102 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Time Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=191) (Level 12)

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

If your next action is to cast a cantrip or a spell that is at least 2 levels lower than the highest level spell slot you have, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

**Special** This can only be used on a cantrip or spell from the class matching the one you gained this feat from.
name: Quickened Casting
